{{anchor|John Pike}}On Friday November 18, police on the University of California at Davis deployed [[pepper spray]] on a group of student protestors as they [[nonviolence | sat quietly on the ground]].<ref>{{cite news | newspaper=[[The Cleveland Leader]] | title=UC Davis Police Brutally Pepper Spray OWS Protesters Sitting Peacefully on Campus | url=http://www.clevelandleader.com/node/17846 | first=Julie | last= Kent | date= 19 November 2011 | accessdate = 21 Nobember 2011}}</ref>
+
{{anchor|John Pike}}On Friday November 18, police on the University of California at Davis deployed [[pepper spray]] on a group of 11 student protestors as they [[nonviolence | sat quietly on the ground]].<ref>{{cite news | newspaper=[[The Cleveland Leader]] | title=UC Davis Police Brutally Pepper Spray OWS Protesters Sitting Peacefully on Campus | url=http://www.clevelandleader.com/node/17846 | first=Julie | last= Kent | date= 19 November 2011 | accessdate = 21 Nobember 2011}}</ref>
